casebody.data:
H. GOODMAN & SONS, Inc., and Fleming & Keevers Co., Inc., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Jack RUBIN and Noah Rubin, Copartners Trading under the Firm Name and Style of Rubin Bros., Defendants-Appellees. No. 319. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 1, 1935. G. H. Mitchell and MacNeil Mitchell, both of New York City, for H. Goodman & Sons, Inc. David P. Siegel, of New York City (H. C. Bierman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (4 F. Supp. 241) affirmed.
